faqs.question: Is this only for developers?
faqs.answer: No. Designers, educators, translators, and anyone passionate about education technology is welcome. Every skill contributes to our mission.

faqs.question: Paid or volunteer?
faqs.answer: 100% open source, volunteer-driven. We believe in the power of community and shared purpose over monetary incentives.

faqs.question: Will this take too much time?
faqs.answer: Contribute when you can; small, consistent contributions matter more than large, infrequent ones. Even 30 minutes a week makes a difference.

faqs.question: Where is the impact?
faqs.answer: Rural classrooms, community centers, low-resource schools across India. We focus on reaching the most underserved communities.

faqs.question: How can I contribute if I'm not technical?
faqs.answer: We need designers, educators, translators, content writers, and community managers. Every skill set is valuable for our mission.

faqs.question: What technologies do you use?
faqs.answer: We use a variety of technologies including React, Node.js, Python, and more. The focus is on creating accessible, lightweight solutions.

faqs.question: How do you ensure quality?
faqs.answer: All contributions go through peer review, testing, and community feedback. We maintain high standards while being welcoming to newcomers.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new project ideas?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We welcome project suggestions that align with our mission of educational technology for underprivileged children.
